hero.title: Discover Your
hero.description: Learn arts and crafts from professionals. Build your skills, unleash your imagination, and create something amazing.

categories.title: Explore Categories
categories.subtitle: Discover various art and craft categories

descriptions.origamiWorld: Discover the ancient art of paper folding with our step-by-step origami tutorials. From simple cranes to complex flowers, learn to create beautiful paper sculptures that will amaze your friends and family.
descriptions.drawing: Unleash your creativity with our comprehensive drawing tutorials. Learn fundamental techniques, shading, perspective, and various drawing styles from beginner to advanced levels.
descriptions.beadsJewelry: Create stunning jewelry and accessories with our bead crafting tutorials. Learn different techniques for making bracelets, necklaces, earrings, and decorative items using various types of beads.
descriptions.clay: Explore the world of clay crafting and pottery. Learn hand-building techniques, sculpting, and creating functional and decorative ceramic pieces from basic to advanced projects.
descriptions.preschoolCrafts: Fun and educational craft activities designed specifically for young children. Safe, simple projects that help develop fine motor skills and creativity in preschoolers.
descriptions.scienceDiy: Combine learning with fun through exciting science experiments and DIY projects. Explore physics, chemistry, and biology concepts through hands-on activities and experiments.
descriptions.recyclingArt: Turn everyday waste into beautiful art pieces. Learn eco-friendly crafting techniques using recycled materials to create unique decorations and functional items.
descriptions.perlerBeads: Create amazing pixel art and 3D designs with colorful Perler beads! Learn to make keychains, coasters, characters, and decorative items using this fun melting bead technique.
descriptions.threeDPenFun: Discover the world of 3D printing with a pen! Create incredible three-dimensional sculptures, jewelry, architectural models, and artistic designs using 3D printing pen technology.

videos.stepByStep: Follow along with this step-by-step tutorial.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to Art Craft Academy. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
introduction.content2: By using our website and services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access or use our services.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.provideServices: To provide, operate, and maintain our services
howWeUse.improveServices: To improve, personalize, and expand our services
howWeUse.communication: To communicate with you about updates, promotions, and support
howWeUse.personalization: To personalize your experience and provide relevant content
howWeUse.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website performance
howWeUse.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

businessTransfer.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfer.content: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the business transaction.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
dataSecurity.encryption: Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.accessControls: Strict access controls and authentication procedures
dataSecurity.regularAudits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
dataSecurity.secureServers: Secure server environments and data centers
dataSecurity.content2: However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: You have the right to request copies of your personal information

correction.title: Right to Rectification
correction.content: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information

deletion.title: Right to Erasure
deletion.content: You have the right to request deletion of your personal information under certain circumstances

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.content: You have the right to request transfer of your data to another organization

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.content: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal information under certain circumstances

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized services. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our website.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for the website to function properly

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.content: Help us analyze website usage and improve performance

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: Remember your preferences and personalize your experience

targeting.title: Targeting Cookies
targeting.content: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and content

cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or by contacting us directly.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our website may integrate with third-party services that have their own privacy policies:
thirdParty.youtube: For embedding educational videos and tutorials
thirdParty.analytics: For website analytics and performance monitoring

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are designed for users of all ages, including children. We take special care to protect children's privacy and comply with applicable laws regarding the collection of information from children under 13. We encourage parents and guardians to monitor their children's online activities and help us protect their privacy.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers are conducted in accordance with applicable data protection laws and that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When information is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
